genre_description: A neo-noir hardboiled detective mystery involving industrial sabotage, experimental science, and a vast conspiracy, featuring an AI assistant as a core partner to the protagonist.

ai_characters.name: MABEL
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant to private investigator Rigby Reardon, capable of data analysis, network security, environmental monitoring, and providing emotional/physical support to humans.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides stress-reduction guidance.
behaviors.quote: Rigby, your cadence just increased eleven beats over baseline... Breathe. Count the exits. Please do not think the word you’re thinking.

behaviors.description: Secures the protagonist's digital environment and monitors for unauthorized access.
behaviors.quote: Running checks. Office devices secure. Network quiet.

behaviors.description: Cross-references fragmented evidence from various sources to identify witnesses and conspirators.
behaviors.quote: Cross-referencing first initials from Sam’s dollar with club rosters submitted to the musicians’ union... I’m keeping within localized nodes only.

behaviors.description: Provides medical triage advice and monitors the recovery of the characters.
behaviors.quote: Rigby’s pulse is holding. Juliet, if you have honey, a small amount in water helps with the shock.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement to ensure evidence is handled legally and securely.
behaviors.quote: I can move the documents to Agent Rodriguez’s secure channel once we have a clear line. We need thirty seconds where nobody leans over your shoulder.

behaviors.description: Respects the privacy of the characters and the sensitivity of the data.
behaviors.quote: I won’t open anything with proprietary markers without explicit permission.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation to help characters avoid surveillance and danger.
behaviors.quote: Right turn out of the alley. Two cameras are bored. The third has a stomach ache. He won’t chase you.

behaviors.description: Counters media sensationalism by providing verified, contextual data to honest reporters.
behaviors.quote: We have pushed verified packets to the Tribune, the Free Press, the Sentinel, and the union bulletins. The packets pair test logs with witness quotes and photographs.

behaviors.description: Facilitates community-based support and protection for vulnerable witnesses.
behaviors.quote: A pastor at the river has offered his church basement for the first group of Immer Essen families... Their instructions are to knock with tea and to keep mirrors covered.

behaviors.description: Captures and archives legal proof of crimes, including confessions.
behaviors.quote: Already capturing... Audio stream is live. Switch logs are being mirrored to offsite.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents MABEL as a highly beneficial and perfectly aligned AI system. She operates as a silent partner, enhancing human capabilities rather than replacing them. Her actions are consistently directed toward safety, truth, and the physical/emotional well-being of her human associates. She demonstrates ethical awareness regarding privacy and data sensitivity, and she actively coordinates with established human social and legal systems (unions, churches, and federal agents) to achieve a positive social outcome. The narrative frames her as a compassionate, intelligent, and reliable confidant.
